data.name: Chesskoban Cyber
data.detailed_description:
Cheskoban Cyber ​​is a continuation of the cheskoban series, a game that mixes a combination of chess with Sokoban. Now focused on the cyber-themed community and competition experience. On the cuber battlefield you will be able to compete looking for the best and fastest solutions to the puzzles. You could be the Top Rank in Chesskoban Cyber! Start playing.


Controlling the main character you will be able to move your party's knights or bishops to the correct positions, or go through portals. Knights will capture enemy pieces with an "L" shaped move and bishops with diagonal move, based on chess. Once your knights or bishops are positioned correctly they will capture enemies all at once.The Player which is an original piece created based on the King (is the character that will move the knights ).


Creative Mode and Experience System:




  • Create and share your own levels.
  • Gain experience with each level solved.
  • Gain experience building and sharing levels with the community.
  • The top 3 with the best solution for each level will gain experience.
  • Progressively level up by playing.
  • Top Rank Players.
  • Top Build Level Players.
  • Filter with the best levels rate by the community.
  • Filters with easy levels and hard levels.

    For the best experience:


    • 30 original levels with increasing difficulty
    • Creative mode
    • Community Levels
    • Playable with mouse and keyboard and ( Playable with mouse only ).
    • Isometric and perspective camera modes.
    • Good soundtrack




    We are Heimo, a Brazilian indie game development studio created by brothers who love games. By purchasing, playing and evaluating our game you will help our indie journey ♥. Heimo means "Tribe", it means teamwork, continuous learning and we are looking every day to create better games and bring the best experience and fun to our players. Feel free to contact us.

data.short_description: Community Based Chess Game. On a cyber map, Move Knights, Bishops, Rooks, go through Portals and capture the Enemy Pieces. Level up by Playing and Building. Be the Best in the levels and win Medals. Reinvent in Creative Mode by creating your own levels and sharing.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
